title: Marin Releases Special Edition Alpine Trail Carbon Fun2
content:
Ready to bring the Fun? How about bringing the Fun2? Well, then we have you covered. Marin Bikes‘ limited-edition Alpine Trail Carbon Fun2 frameset takes all that is great with the acclaimed Alpine Trail Carbon enduro frame, including 150mm of smooth MultiTrac travel, and wraps it all in a wild fade of flashy paint that hearkens back to the earlier days of our storied history.

While the paint leans retro, the technology underneath is fully modern, with a unidirectional carbon fiber main triangle bolstered by a bridgeless Series 4 aluminum seatstay and chainstay, forged one-piece rocker, and contemporary geometry numbers with 63.5° HTA and 78° STA. To top things (and you) off, the Fun2 frameset also includes a limited edition Helfare x Marin hat, each one autographed by Matt Jones.

It’s a great start to your bespoke build and includes RockShox suspension, with a 160mm Yari RC up front and a Deluxe Select+ shock out back. Other features include a TranzX dropper post and lever, FSA sealed cartridge bearing headset, seat clamp, front and rear thru-axles, and custom downtube and seat stay protectors to simplify your new dream bike’s parts sourcing.

MSRP $1999 (US), 2099€ (EU), £1999 (UK), $2599 (CAN)

See more at Marin.
